records.title: Safe Platform Overview
records.description: Safe is at the forefront of modular smart account infrastructure, paving the way for developers to create various applications and wallets. The platform establishes universal and open contract standards for the custody of digital assets, data, and identity.
keyPoints: Universal contract standards for digital asset custody
Two primary offerings: Safe{Core} (infrastructure) and Safe{Wallet} (user interface)
AI agent capabilities with spending limits and DeFi integrations

components.safeCore: Infrastructure tooling for integrating Smart Accounts and leveraging account abstraction
components.safeWallet: User-facing interface for digital asset management

records.title: Safe{Core} SDK
records.description: The Safe{Core} SDK comprises four integrated kits designed to streamline Account Abstraction implementation with modular, battle-tested components.

kits.name: Starter Kit
kits.purpose: Entry point for Smart Account interaction

kits.name: Protocol Kit
kits.purpose: Direct engagement with Safe Smart Accounts
features: Modular and customizable smart contract accounts
useCases: Signature handling for transactions and messages
technicalCapabilities: TypeScript interface for Safe Smart Accounts
Managing signatures for transactions and messages

kits.name: API Kit
kits.purpose: Interface with Safe Transaction Service API
useCases: Retrieve Safe information (transaction history, pending transactions)

kits.name: Relay Kit
useCases: Enable users to pay fees with native tokens
Pay transaction fees with ERC-20 tokens

additionalPackages.name: Types Kit
additionalPackages.purpose: Common types used across Safe Core SDK packages

keyFeatures: Account Abstraction integration through modular design

records.title: Safe Core - Smart Account Architecture
records.description: Safe Smart Accounts are built on a proxy pattern architecture with modular components enabling secure, flexible multi-signature account management.

coreComponents.name: Safe Singleton Contract
coreComponents.description: Main contract holding logic for signature verification, executing transactions, managing owners, modules, and fallback handler
coreComponents.pattern: Single deployed instance used by all Safe proxies via delegation

coreComponents.name: SafeProxy
coreComponents.description: Lightweight proxy contract that delegates all calls to the Safe Singleton
benefits: Smaller bytecode than full Safe contract

coreComponents.name: Owner Management
features: Add, remove, and replace account owners

coreComponents.name: Module Management
coreComponents.description: Smart contracts that implement Safe's functionality while separating module logic from Safe's core contract

availableModules.name: Allowance Module
availableModules.purpose: Daily spending limits without multi-sig approval

availableModules.name: Recovery Module
availableModules.purpose: Account recovery mechanisms if access is lost

availableModules.name: 4337 Module
availableModules.purpose: ERC-4337 standard compliance for account abstraction

availableModules.name: Passkey Module
availableModules.purpose: Biometric and hardware security key support

coreComponents.securityWarning: Safe Modules can be a security risk since they can execute arbitrary transactions. Only add trusted and audited modules to a Safe.

coreComponents.name: Guard Management
coreComponents.description: Transaction validation through guards that check if a transaction should be executed or rejected based on defined logic

securityModel.description: A threshold of owners must confirm a transaction before execution to provide a secure default without trusting any additional contract

moduleSystem.architecture: Separate smart contract extensions alongside core multi-sig mechanism
executionFlow: User interaction triggers module function call
Module validates authorization and rule compliance
Transaction executes if all conditions are met
benefits: Automation of recurring transactions without manual approvals
Security enhancements (spending caps, whitelists, rate limiting)
Scalability through delegation of complex operations
Flexibility for DAOs, DeFi protocols, and custom workflows

records.title: Safe{Core} Infrastructure API
records.description: Safe{Core} Infrastructure comprises interconnected services that power Safe{Wallet} with transaction tracking, event delivery, and multi-chain support.

services.name: Safe Transaction Service
services.purpose: Track transactions related to Safe contracts across supported networks

services.name: Safe Events Service
services.purpose: Handle Safe indexing and deliver notifications
features: Transaction indexing notifications to Client Gateway

services.name: Safe Client Gateway
services.purpose: Facade between end users and core services
responsibilities: Query Config Service for Transaction Service instances
Route requests to appropriate Transaction Service
Transform and aggregate data from multiple services
Receive webhook notifications from Event Service

services.name: Safe Config Service
services.purpose: Store supported networks and chain-specific configuration

integrationFlow: Client Gateway queries Config Service for appropriate Transaction Service instance
Request routes to specified Transaction Service
Client Gateway transforms and aggregates data from multiple services
Event Service notifies Client Gateway of indexed events via webhooks

records.title: ERC-4337 Account Abstraction Integration
records.description: ERC-4337 enables account abstraction without protocol-level changes, introducing flexible gas payment and authentication mechanisms.

coreConcepts.description: Pseudo-transaction object that sends a transaction on behalf of the user
coreConcepts.purpose: Enable account abstraction at application layer

coreConcepts.description: Network nodes that collect multiple user operations and pack them into bundle transactions
Global smart contract that receives bundled user operations
coreConcepts.scope: Single contract for all ERC-4337 operations

coreConcepts.description: Decentralized mechanism allowing flexible gas payment options
capabilities: Pay with ERC-20 tokens (e.g., USDC instead of ETH)

primaryAdvantages.description: Users choose payment methodsâ€”native tokens, ERC-20 alternatives, or sponsored gas
Supports multi-signature, passkeys, and future quantum-resistant cryptography
Multiple provider support prevents relayer lock-in and eliminates single points of failure

records.implementationStatus: Under active development - monitor ongoing changes before full production deployment

safeIntegration.relayKit: Enables ERC-4337 integration with Safe accounts

focusAreas: Safe API Kit and Transaction Service
metadata.codeExamplesAvailable: Limited in web docs - refer to GitHub repositories for detailed examples
nextSteps: Access GitHub repositories for code examples
Review playground scripts in safe-core-sdk repository
Explore API reference documentation for detailed method signatures
Test integration patterns using provided guides
